title: Shadows of Sanctuary
description: Each one of them has a tale to tell - thieves, harlots, godlings, and sorcerous beings living in the Shadows of Sanctuary.Following on from Thieves' World and Tales from the Vulgar Unicorn, seven top fantasy writers have written the stories of those who live and die in this infamous place.Join Lynn Abbey, Andrew Offutt, Vonda N. McIntyre and Janet Morris - but be the world of Sanctuary is a dangerous one.Introduction Robert AsprinIschade C.J.
